article.title: Winski Assigned to Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff

tags.tag: Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff G-3/5/7

article.text: Brig. Gen. Brian E. Winski, USA, has been assigned as director, operations, readiness and mobilization, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-3/-5/-7, U.S. Army, Washington, D.C.
